post.author: 이성기
post.content:
제가 일전에 적은 적이 있는 lightweight framework, Roja에 관한 논문이 드디어 www.jroundup.com (Rational Rose promoted Java web site) 에 실렸습니다.
Main menu (http://www.jroundup.com) -> Learn it -> "Building Framework with Design Pattern" or direct link http://www.jroundup.com/resources/resource.jsp?articleID=1004540645522.94&articleType=learnit&articleStatus=live
post.title: My white paper is on jround.com site.
